mapper.select: select count(*) from chat_room where product_num = #{product_num} and (seller = #{seller} and buyer = #{buyer})
mapper.insert: insert into chat_room (room_id, product_num, buyer, seller) values ( #{room_id}, #{product_num}, #{buyer}, #{seller})
insert into chat_message (chat_id, room_id, seller_id, buyer_id, chat_content) values(chat_message_chat_id_seq.nextbal, #{room_id}, #{seller_id}, #{buyer_id}, #{chat_content})
